DOC.brief_summary: The study will assess the disease severity and treatment patterns of rheumatoid arthritis in Eastern European, Middle Eastern, and North African countries.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of the Disease Severity and Treatment Patterns of Rheumatoid Arthritis in Eastern Europe, Middle East and North African Countries (P08167)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Confirmed diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis, preferably based upon criteria established by the American College of Rheumatology (ACR) 1987 clinical signs & symptoms data obtained from previous laboratory and instrumental examination, which may include but is not limited to: Radiography, Blood tests Written informed consent, signed before participation in the study. Exclusion Criteria : Refusal to participate in the study Age under 18 years
